'''Stadium's "Spicy Feast" Backed Chair''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for Stadium's "Spicy Feast" Backed Chair is obtainable from [[Realm Depot]] for {{Item|Realm Currency|30|x=160}}.
